author: luc
msg: removed a development test that was committed by error

author: luc
msg: fixed event handling during multistep restart phase,
the interpolator used for regular integration and the interpolator used during restart went out of sync

author: luc
msg: fixed corner cases when events occur right at integration start
(which in fact always happen when a resetting event forces a restart just after the event has occurred)

author: luc
msg: fixed an infinite loop error that occurred when an event that reset the state occurs exactly at multistep initialisation start
